title: how can i take my rp or money back
body: (can i speak with a greek rioter) I have benn perma banned , can i take my rp to a new acc or my money back, i spend a lot of money for your company and now you just ban . ok with that if i am toxic so iif you can give the money back riot at least?I dint work to get all this money for nothing so please give them back or anban my sccount and just dont let me chat with others please!

replies.body: If you're ever looking for a refund on a banned account you can reach out to the EU billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see what can or can't be done.
Can you help with that? i dont undrstand what to do perfectly.
